com.camerontec.util.data

Class AbstractBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.data.AbstractBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buffer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSafeBuffer, BytesSegmentBuffer, UnsafeBuffer

    public abstract class AbstractBuffer
extends Object
implements Buffer
    Base class for Buffer implementations which provides support for buffer operations for types which are not generally supported by underlying implementations directly.

      • getBoolean

        public boolean getBoolean(int index)
        Description copied from interface: Buffer
        Get the boolean value at the specified buffer index.

        Note that the method by which a boolean value is encoded is not specified. Therefore an accurate boolean value may only be retrieved if previously written via Buffer.putBoolean(int, boolean).

        Specified by:
        getBoolean in interface Buffer
        Parameters:
        index - The index.
        Returns:
        The boolean value at the specified index.
